identity.mission: Create a warm, accessible, and dignified medication tracking experience for the elderly, rejecting cold clinical aesthetics.
principles: Clarity is Kindness: Big text, high contrast, no ambiguity.
Warmth over Tech: Use organic colors and textures, not 'SaaS Blue'.
Forgiving Design: Big touch targets, clear error states, voice-first options.
Companionship: The app should feel like a helper, not a monitor.

typography.instructions: Import 'Lexend' and 'Mulish' from Google Fonts. Use Lexend for all Headings to improve reading proficiency. Use Mulish for body text. BASE TEXT SIZE MUST BE 18px (text-lg) MINIMUM.

primary.description: Terracotta/Deep Coral. High visibility, warm, urgent but not alarming. Use for Main Actions (Add Med, Emergency).

secondary.description: Sage Green. Use for Success states, 'Taken' status, and health indicators.

accent.description: Warm Ochre/Yellow. Use for reminders and highlights.

layout.grid_strategy: Bento Grid Mode A (Modified for Low Density)
rules: Mobile First: Stack everything on mobile.
Touch Targets: Minimum 48px x 48px for all interactive elements.
Cards: Use 'border-2' and 'rounded-xl' or 'rounded-2xl' for friendly, distinct shapes.
No Clutter: One primary action per screen if possible.

buttons.style: rounded-full font-bold text-lg h-14 px-8 shadow-md hover:shadow-lg transition-all active:scale-95

cards.style: bg-white border-2 border-border rounded-2xl shadow-sm hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors p-6

inputs.style: h-14 text-lg px-4 rounded-xl border-2 border-input focus:border-primary focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 bg-white

navigation.mobile: Fixed bottom bar, h-20, large icons (32px), labels always visible.
navigation.desktop: Simple top bar, large text links.

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle paper grain overlay (opacity 0.03) on background to reduce digital harshness.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Soft, diffuse shadows (shadow-lg) for floating elements like the 'Voice' button.
visual_enhancers.icons: Use 'Phosphor Icons' (Duotone or Fill) for clarity. Icon size: w-8 h-8 minimum.

hero_elderly.description: Active elderly man walking, conveying health and independence.

doctor_consult.description: Friendly doctor with clipboard, for the 'Doctor Communication' section.

healthy_lunch.description: Fresh salad bowl, for the 'Daily Tracker' lunch section.

water_glass.description: Clear glass of water, for the 'Water Intake' tracker.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 minimum contrast for all text. Use APCA where possible.
accessibility.voice_ui: Implement a large, floating 'Microphone' button (FAB) on the dashboard for voice commands.
accessibility.screen_reader: All images must have descriptive alt text. All buttons must have aria-labels.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' (default) or 'phosphor-react' (preferred). Install 'clsx' and 'tailwind-merge' for class management.
2. THEME: Update 'tailwind.config.js' and 'index.css' with the 'Organic & Earthy' palette defined above. FORCE LIGHT MODE default.
3. FONTS: Add Google Fonts import for Lexend and Mulish in 'index.css'.
4. COMPONENTS: When using Shadcn components, OVERRIDE the default small sizes. Increase padding (p-4 -> p-6), font-size (text-sm -> text-lg), and border-radius.
5. LAYOUT: Build the Dashboard using the 'Bento Grid' strategy but keep it simple (1-2 columns on mobile, 3 on desktop).
6. VOICE: The Voice Recognition feature is key. Make the trigger button prominent and accessible.
7. DO NOT use gradients for text or backgrounds. Keep it flat, textured, and high-contrast.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to every interactive element (buttons, inputs, links).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) ONLY for overlays, not main content (readability first).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
